description:
With the cafe air conditioning broken, Mafuyu asks Yuzuka to transform. Once it starts to cool down nicely, everyone decides to play together?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Because I Can`t Stay in This Outfit
Datte, Kono Mama no Kakkou ja
La clim a rendu son dernier souffle
だって, このままの格好じゃ
